reviews.text: We spent a week in Courchevel at the Chalethotel Dahu (27th Jan 2013) with my Husband, my parents and 3 year old.
reviews.title: Great Location, Fab Food, Excellent Staff!

reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about the Hotel having read some earlier comments, but I can honestly say that it was brilliant! The room we had accommodated an extra bed for my daughter, and yes, it was a little small, but how much time do you spend in your room? For us it was quite adequate.
reviews.title: Superb location for a Ski holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a lovely balcony which Im sure had a great view, but due to the amount of snow we were unable to utilise it to its full extent.
reviews.title: Great staff, excellent location but small room.

reviews.text: We used the Crèche on a few days (didn’t book for the whole week, just paid on the day direct with the hotel) and the staff were fantastic. My Daughter had a great time playing, bum-boarding and painting; and their evening "baby sitting" service was excellent. The little ones go down at 7.15pm, watch a film (if they can stay awake that long!) and then get put to into little beds and watched over by 2 Nannies. My daughter was sound asleep every time and after we had had our dinner we picked her up and took her straight to bed!
reviews.title: Great location but very small rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kids lunch and dinner was also good and you had a good variety of foods to chose from. My Daughter cleaned her plate every time - and she can be really fussy!
reviews.title: Chalet Hotel Dahu, Outstanding Value, Service, and Location
